body:
### Steps to reproduce

spack won't install any package for my spack development build.  I used minime as an example package.   I can flip to the original concretizer and and then I can build.    platform is eclipse at SNL.

```
jgalaro@eclipse-login3 spack]$ spack install minime
==> Bootstrapping clingo from pre-built binaries
==> Bootstrapping clingo from sources
==> Error: cannot bootstrap the "clingo" Python module from spec "clingo-bootstrap@spack+python %gcc target=x86_64" due to the following failures:
    'github-actions' raised RuntimeError: could not populate the binary index
    'spack-install' raised ConflictsInSpecError: Conflicts in concretized spec "clingo-bootstrap@spack%gcc@4.9.3~docs~ipo+python~static_libstdcpp build_type=Release arch=linux-rhel7-x86_64/cvmqzep"

    List of matching conflicts for spec:

    clingo-bootstrap@spack%gcc@4.9.3~docs~ipo+python~static_libstdcpp build_type=Release arch=linux-rhel7-x86_64
        ^bison@3.0.4%gcc@4.9.3 patches=b72914fe38e54a6fc25f29019e0a0786705c4f61ce20d414cc2010c8d62448c7 arch=linux-rhel7-x86_64
        ^cmake@3.21.3%gcc@4.9.3~doc+ncurses+openssl+ownlibs~qt build_type=Release arch=linux-rhel7-x86_64
            ^ncurses@6.2%gcc@4.9.3~symlinks+termlib abi=none arch=linux-rhel7-x86_64
                ^pkgconf@1.8.0%gcc@4.9.3 arch=linux-rhel7-x86_64
            ^openssl@1.1.1l%gcc@4.9.3~docs certs=system arch=linux-rhel7-x86_64
                ^perl@5.34.0%gcc@4.9.3+cpanm+shared+threads arch=linux-rhel7-x86_64
                    ^berkeley-db@18.1.40%gcc@4.9.3+cxx~docs+stl patches=b231fcc4d5cff05e5c3a4814f6a5af0e9a966428dc2176540d2c05aff41de522 arch=linux-rhel7-x86_64
                    ^bzip2@1.0.8%gcc@4.9.3~debug~pic+shared arch=linux-rhel7-x86_64
                        ^diffutils@3.8%gcc@4.9.3 arch=linux-rhel7-x86_64
                            ^libiconv@1.16%gcc@4.9.3 libs=shared,static arch=linux-rhel7-x86_64
                    ^gdbm@1.19%gcc@4.9.3 arch=linux-rhel7-x86_64
                        ^readline@8.1%gcc@4.9.3 arch=linux-rhel7-x86_64
                    ^zlib@1.2.11%gcc@4.9.3+optimize+pic+shared arch=linux-rhel7-x86_64
        ^python@3.6%gcc@4.9.3+bz2+ctypes+dbm~debug+libxml2+lzma~nis~optimizations+pic+pyexpat+pythoncmd+readline+shared+sqlite3+ssl~tix~tkinter~ucs4+uuid+zlib arch=linux-rhel7-x86_64
        ^re2c@2.2%gcc@4.9.3 arch=linux-rhel7-x86_64

1. "%gcc@:5" conflicts with "clingo-bootstrap" [C++14 support is required to bootstrap clingo]

    Please run `spack -d spec zlib` for more verbose error messages
[jgalaro@eclipse-login3 spack]$ 
[jgalaro@eclipse-login3 spack]$ spack find
==> 0 installed packages
```

### Error message

see above.

### Information on your system

[jgalaro@eclipse-login3 packages]$ spack debug report
* **Spack:** 0.16.3-4702-713bbdbe7c
* **Python:** 3.6.8
* **Platform:** linux-rhel7-broadwell
* **Concretizer:** original  -- was clingo, but I changed it to make progress.


### General information

- [X] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [X] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
- [X] I have run the failing commands in debug mode and reported the output
title: "%gcc@:5" conflicts with "clingo-bootstrap" [C++14 support is required to bootstrap clingo]
